has research problem: compressing the word embeddings without any significant sacrifices in performance

has research problem.from sentence: Deploying neural NLP models to mobile devices requires compressing the word embeddings without any significant sacrifices in performance .

has research problem: constructing word embeddings with drastically fewer parameters

has research problem.from sentence: In this work , we utilize such codes fora different purpose , that is , constructing word embeddings with drastically fewer parameters .

has research problem: compress the size of NLP models

has research problem.from sentence: Thus , it is becoming more important to compress the size of NLP models for deployment to devices with limited memory or storage capacity .
